prompt:
A seductive Korean woman in her 20s in a quiet kitchen at dawn, framed waist-up.
Pose: rolling up sleeves, leaning lightly on counter, hips angled, subtle arch.
Expression: calm dominant gaze, half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: crisp cotton shirt + fitted matte tank, weave and wrinkles visible.
Lighting: cool dawn window light + warm under-cabinet tungsten mixed, smooth highlight
roll-off.
Camera: 35mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Gold 200 vibe.
